text: Kagra mago avontafe eritenka, Israeli vahete'ene Juda vahete'enena maka kumatamimpima fore'ma hania knazanku'ma kasami'noa nanekea ana maka avontafepi krento. Hagi ana nanekema krentesanana, Josaia'ma kinima mani'nea knafima agafama hu'na nanekema kasami'noregati krenteme enka ama knare ehanatio.
